projects.title: T.M.I.
projects.description: I created the T.M.I. app because I recognized a need for a more streamlined, efficient way to manage tasks. In both personal and professional life, people often struggle to organize their to-do lists and prioritize their responsibilities effectively. This struggle can lead to stress, missed deadlines, and a decrease in productivity.

projects.title: Final Project
